Goetz's writing career began in the early 1900s, when he published his first novel, "La vida de un loco," which was a critical success. He went on to publish several more novels, including "La vida de un loco," "La vida de un loco," and "La vida de un loco." In addition to his novels, Goetz also wrote short stories and essays, which were published in various newspapers and magazines.
